text:
SALEM

Sri Dasarathi Kaingarya Kaingarya Trust and Kinjitkaram Trust: ISKCON bhajan, 5 p.m.; Upanyasam by Velukkudi U.V. Krishnan Swami, Sumangali marriage hall, 6 p.m.

Ramakrishna Mission Ashrama: Narai S. Nellaiappan speaks on ‘Swami Akhandanada’s life’, 7 p.m.

Sri Skandashraman Trust: Srimad Sadguru Sanathananda Swamigal’s jayanthi festival, Sri Mahanyasa jabam, sri rudra jabam, abishekam, 6.30 am.; deeparadana, 11 a.m.; special poojas and parayanam, 6 p.m.; Veeramani Raju renders devotional songs, 4 p.m.

Tamil Nadu Science Forum: Monthly science lecture, Ajith speaks, TNMSRA building, Koranguchavadi, 6 p.m.

Salem Productivity Council: Training programme on ‘Labour laws with recent amendments’, V. Chandrasekaran, industrial law and labour law practitioner, resource person, SPC bhavan, 10 a.m.

Sona College of Technology: Graduation Day, Rahul Kadri, Principal architect, I. M. Kadri Architects, chief guest, R. A. Krishnakumar, Executive Director, Dalmia Cement (Bharat) Limited, Dalmiapuram, speaks, C. Valliappan, Chairman, presides, 10.30 a.m.

District Employment Exchange: Training programme for Staff Selection Commission aspirants, 10 a.m.

NAMAKKAL

PGP College of Engineering and Technology: National-level conference on Modern emerging engineering trends, Sriram from National Institute of Technology Tiruchi, resource person, 10 a.m.

Paavai Educational Institutions: Graduation Day, S.K. Patnaik, Director, AICTE, New Delhi, chief guest, N.V. Natarajan, chairman, presides, 2 p.m.

TIRUCHENGODE

Vivekanandha Institute of Engineering and Technology for Women: NSS special camp, inauguration, M. Karunanithi, Chairman, presides, Panchayat Union School, Kosavampalayam, 10.30 a.m.

RASIPURAM

Muthayammal College of Arts and Science: Achievers Day, R. Venkatachalapathy, Professor of Geology, Periyar University, speaks, 2 p.m.
title: engagements
